name: KashFlow
overview:
KashFlow provides intuitive, easy to use accounting software for small business owners. Its focus is on automating repetitive accounting tasks and removing the jargon and complicated language associated with incumbent account software.

The company offers an API and over forty add-ons in the areas of payroll, payroll processing, e-commerce systems, CRM and time and/or project management.

As well as being the leader in user-friendly accounting software, KashFlow is a pioneer of the SaaS (software as a service) business model. They pride themselves on offering outstanding support, which is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

As well as receiving praise from Bill Gates, Alistair Darling and Prince Charles, the company has won a number of awards, including beating industry leaders Sage and Quickbooks in the Software Satisfaction Awards that are independently voted on by software users.

The company, based in London, was founded by its CEO, Duane Jackson. It is chaired by The Rt Hon Lord Young of Graffham, former Secretary of State for Trade and Industry and former chairman of Cable & Wireless.

milestones.description: Lord Young of Graffham appointed as Chairman
milestones.source_description: KashFlow Appoints Former Secretary of State Lord Young as Chairman

milestones.description: Michelle Gorsuch appointed as Sales Director
Launch of Orbit Accounts, specifically aimed at accountants in practice
